item.title: 日本国内生产总值增长影响 2% 的国防开支目标
item.description: 日本国内生产总值（GDP）的增长对该国来说听起来似乎是个好消息，但这也意味着它将不得不付出更多的代价来实现国防开支占 GDP 2% 的目标，这对于一个已经面临美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求其提高军事产出压力的国家来说无疑是雪上加霜。【原文：The growth of Japan’s GDP may sound like good news for the country, but it also means it will have to pay more to reach its target to spend 2% of GDP on defense, adding to the woes of a nation already under pressure from US President Donald Trump to boost its military output.】

item.title: US Soybean Cargoes Sail to China Despite Retaliatory Tariff
